javax.activity.coordination
Interface ServiceManager

public interface ServiceManager

A ServiceManager is an entity that is provided by a UOW service that uses the Activity service; it is a factory for the UOW service's object and also specifies how the UOW service's Activities should be managed. In particular, it is used to specify:

  • which PropertyGroups the UOW service uses
  • the CompletionSignalSet that is used to complete the UOW services's Activities.
  • the ServiceInformation for the service's Activities. This object describes which ContextGroup the UOW service participates in and is propagated as part of the Activity service context.

The Activity service uses the ServiceManager when it creates and operates on Activities specific to that service.

Method Summary
 int getActivityType()
          Returns the type of the Activities that are created for this UOW service.
 java.lang.String getCompletionSignalSetName()
          Returns the name of the SignalSet, if any, that will be used for the distribution of completion signals when the current Activity completes.
 PropertyGroupManager getPropertyGroupManager(java.lang.String PropertyGroupName)
          Returns a reference to an instance of a PropertyGroupManager, responsible for creating and managing the PropertyGroup identified in PropertyGroupName.
 java.lang.String[] getPropertyGroupNames()
          Returns the array of PropertyGroup names that are used by the UOW service.
 ServiceInformation getServiceInformation()
          Returns a reference to a ServiceInformation object that encapsulates all the information about the UOW service that needs to be propagated as part of Activity service context in the type_specific_data, for example the ContextGroup name.
 SignalSet getSignalSet(java.lang.String SignalSetName)
          Returns a reference to an instance of the named SignalSet.
 void setServiceInformation(ServiceInformation serviceInfo)
          Passes to a ServiceManager instance the ServiceInformation object encoded in the type_specific_data of a received context.
 

Method Detail

getServiceInformation

public ServiceInformation getServiceInformation()
Returns a reference to a ServiceInformation object that encapsulates all the information about the UOW service that needs to be propagated as part of Activity service context in the type_specific_data, for example the ContextGroup name.
Returns:
A ServiceInformation instance.

setServiceInformation

public void setServiceInformation(ServiceInformation serviceInfo)
Passes to a ServiceManager instance the ServiceInformation object encoded in the type_specific_data of a received context.

getSignalSet

public SignalSet getSignalSet(java.lang.String SignalSetName)
                       throws SignalSetUnknownException,
                              NoImplementException
Returns a reference to an instance of the named SignalSet.
In some execution environments, such as a J2EE client, this method need not be implemented and calling it may result in a NoImplementationException.
Returns:
A SignalSet instance.
Throws:
SignalSetUnknownException - Thrown if the named SignalSet is not recognized by the ServiceManager.
NoImplementException - Thrown if the Activity service does not provide an implementation of this method in the calling environment, for example if a J2EE client calls this method.

getPropertyGroupManager

public PropertyGroupManager getPropertyGroupManager(java.lang.String PropertyGroupName)
                                             throws PropertyGroupUnknownException,
                                                    NoImplementException
Returns a reference to an instance of a PropertyGroupManager, responsible for creating and managing the PropertyGroup identified in PropertyGroupName.
In some execution environments, such as a J2EE client, this method need not be implemented and calling it may result in a NoImplementationException.
Returns:
A PropertyGroupManager instance.
Throws:
PropertyGroupUnknownException - Thrown if the named PropertyGroup is not recognized by the ServiceManager.
NoImplementException - Thrown if the Activity service does not provide an implementation of this method in the calling environment, for example if a J2EE client calls this method.

getPropertyGroupNames

public java.lang.String[] getPropertyGroupNames()
Returns the array of PropertyGroup names that are used by the UOW service.
Each time an Activity for this UOW service is started, an instance of each PropertyGroup in the list is started and associated with the Activity.
Returns:
An array of PropertyGroup names that are used by the UOW service. If no PropertyGroups have been specified then this method returns null.

getCompletionSignalSetName

public java.lang.String getCompletionSignalSetName()
Returns the name of the SignalSet, if any, that will be used for the distribution of completion signals when the current Activity completes.
Returns:
The name of the SignalSet that will be used for the distribution of completion signals when the current Activity completes. If no CompletionSignalSet has been set then null is returned.

getActivityType

public int getActivityType()
Returns the type of the Activities that are created for this UOW service. The type is propagated in the ActivityIdentity part of the Activity context and confers information about the format of the type_specific_data encoded in the ActivityIdentity.
This function should return either a value of 2 to indicate that no J2EE-specific information is contained in the ActivityIdentity.type_specific_data or 0x4A324545 to indicate that a ServiceInformation object is contained in the ActivityIdentity.type_specific_data
Returns:
The type value that will be set into the omg.org.CosActivity.ActivityIdentity for Activities created on behalf of this UOW service.
